titles.title: If God Be For Us (easy excellent)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If God be for us If God be for us If God be for us Who can be against us Who - Who - Who Who can be against us Against us{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rejoice in the Lord Oh let His mercy cheer He sunders the bands that enthrall Redeemed by His blood Why should we ever fear Since Jesus is our all in all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be strong in the Lord Rejoicing in His might Be loyal and true day by day When evils assail Be valiant for the right And He will be our strength And stay{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Confide in His Word His promises so sure In Christ they are Yea and amen Though earth pass away They ever shall endure 'Tis written o'er and o'er again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in the Lord Secure in His control 'Tis life everlasting begun To pluck from His hand The weakest trembling soul It never never can be done{/lang-eng}
